messages.subject: butt kissing
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/16/02 1:44:42 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:  ok, now I m red. But
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/16/02 1:44:42 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Ooh! Just like last night! >>

ok, now I'm red.
But if I ever had any Lesbian tendencies.....

lol

Ren
"Knowledge will not always take the place of simple observation."
~Arnold Lobel

> And this is why I will gladly leave this list. Not because of the

Robin S.

> Robin S.
